com.robotium.solo
Class RobotiumUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.robotium.solo.RobotiumUtils

public class RobotiumUtils
extends Object

Contains utility methods. Examples are: removeInvisibleViews(Iterable viewList), filterViews(Class classToFilterBy, Iterable viewList), sortViewsByLocationOnScreen(List views).

Author:
Renas Reda, renas.reda@robotium.com

Filters all Views not within the given set.

Parameters:
classSet - contains all classes that are ok to pass the filter
viewList - the Iterable to filter form
Returns:
an ArrayList with filtered views

Returns:

filterViewsByText

public static <T extends android.widget.TextView> List<T> filterViewsByText(Iterable<T> views,
                                                                            String regex)
Filters a collection of Views and returns a list that contains only Views with text that matches a specified regular expression.

Parameters:
views - The collection of views to scan.
regex - The text pattern to search for.
Returns:
A list of views whose text matches the given regex.
